    Method parameters in org.jscience.engineering.mechanics with type arguments of type Force
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Quantity<Length>
    BeamDeflection.cantilever_EndLoad(Quantity<Force> load, Quantity<Length> length, double elasticModulus, double momentOfInertia)
    Maximum deflection for cantilever beam with end load. δ_max = P * L³ / (3 * E * I)
    static Quantity<Length>
    BeamDeflection.simplySupported_CenterLoad(Quantity<Force> load, Quantity<Length> length, double elasticModulus, double momentOfInertia)
    Maximum deflection for simply supported beam with center point load. δ_max = P * L³ / (48 * E * I)

  • Uses of Force in org.jscience.physics.classical.waves.electromagnetism.fields

    Methods in org.jscience.physics.classical.waves.electromagnetism.fields that return types with arguments of type Force
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Quantity<Force>
    Electromagnetism.coulombForce(Quantity<ElectricCharge> q1, Quantity<ElectricCharge> q2, Quantity<Length> r)
    Coulomb's law: F = k * |q1*q2| / r² where k = 1/(4πε₀)
    static Quantity<Force>
    Electromagnetism.lorentzForce(Quantity<ElectricCharge> charge, Quantity<Velocity> velocity, Quantity<MagneticFluxDensity> B)
    Magnetic force on moving charge: F = qvB (simplified, perpendicular case)
